column3: To prohibit the disposal of lithium-ion batteries in containers not designed for the collection of batteries, and to develop a model for handling fires originating from discarded lithium-ion batteries.
Senators Dodd and Hertzberg, Assembly Members Arambula, Bauer-Kahan, Flora, and Cristina Garcia

column2: Introduced and read for the first time. Sent to the Rules Committee for assignment and sent to print.
